instructions.title: Instructions
instructions.subtitle: Find out who's your Secret Santa!
instructions.sentence1: Seven friends meet at Christmas to play Secret Santa. It's a very peculiar group of seven friends: Alice, Bob, Charlie, Daniel, Eve, Fabiana and Gloria.
instructions.sentence2: Each one has a tattoo with a different number of lines, from one to seven.
instructions.sentence3: Each one has a whistle that sounds with a scale note: C, D, E, F, G, A and B.
instructions.sentence4: In addition, each one usually commits one of the deadly sins each time they celebrate their Christmas dinner: lust, gluttony, greed, sloth, wrath, envy, and pride.
instructions.sentence5: Each bought a different gift: a board game, a SmartWatch, a pair of socks, a videogame, a pair of VR Glasses, perfume, and a book
instructions.sentence6: None of them bought it the same day of the week.
instructions.sentence7: And they've decided to wrap it with different colored wrapping paper: red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo, and violet.
instructions.sentence8: Obviously, no one bought a present for himself.
instructions.sentence9: Choose one of the characters and deduce who your Secret Santa is through the hints!

sin.lust: has tried to sleep with all of the friends in the group
sin.gluttony: usually has another serving and eats someone's dessert
sin.sloth: is so lazy and usually gets late
sin.wrath: broke once someone's gift filled with fury after receiving bad news
sin.envy: is always jealous of other's gifts
sin.pride: has an inflated sense of self-importance and will never recognize a mistake
